name: Bryan Apostol
text: 1. Impose (~10year?) population cap.  2. Allocate most to quality education system and information dissemination.    3. Improve research and integration of sustainable green /nuclear energy.    4. Cheap fare Bullet train from appari to Jolo, or thereabouts. 😋  and one that slows down and just goes underwater for the heck of it.
